title: Fertilizer
summaries: The Fertilizer is a consumable item which immediately grows trees when used on a sapling.

Each use consumes 1 instance of the item and causes the player character to throw out Fertilizer in a small area in front of them. If a sapling meeting the required growing conditions is present in the area of effect, it will immediately sprout into a tree of the corresponding biome.
Saplings that fail to fulfill the growing requirements will not sprout into trees even if the Fertilizer is used on them, essentially wasting the item.

statistics.Tooltip: Causes saplings to instantly grow into trees
statistics.Sell: 10
